member.returns: The font family name of the object.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.SyntaxEditor.UI.FontFamily.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified font family name.
member.param: The family name or names that comprise the new . Multiple family names should be separated by commas.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.SyntaxEditor.UI.FontFamily.#ctor(System.Uri,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified font family name and an optional base uniform resource identifier (URI) value.
member.param: Specifies the base URI that is used to resolve .
The family name or names that comprise the new . Multiple family names should be separated by commas.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.SyntaxEditor.UI.FontFamily.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of an anonymous class.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.SyntaxEditor.UI.FontFamily.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the current font family object and the specified font family object are the same.
member.returns: true if is equal to the current object; otherwise, false. If is not a object, false is returned.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.SyntaxEditor.UI.FontFamily.GetHashCode
member.summary: Serves as a hash function for . It is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.
member.returns: An value that represents the hash code for the current object.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.SyntaxEditor.UI.PixelFormats.Bgr101010
member.summary: Gets the pixel format. is a sRGB format with 32 bits per pixel (BPP). Each color channel (blue, green, and red) is allocated 10 bits per pixel (BPP).
member.returns: The pixel format.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.SyntaxEditor.UI.PixelFormats.Bgr24
member.summary: Gets the pixel format. is a sRGB format with 24 bits per pixel (BPP). Each color channel (blue, green, and red) is allocated 8 bits per pixel (BPP).
member.returns: The pixel format.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.SyntaxEditor.UI.PixelFormats.Bgr32
member.summary: Gets the pixel format. is a sRGB format with 32 bits per pixel (BPP). Each color channel (blue, green, and red) is allocated 8 bits per pixel (BPP).
member.returns: The pixel format.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.SyntaxEditor.UI.PixelFormats.Bgr555
member.summary: Gets the pixel format. is a sRGB format with 16 bits per pixel (BPP). Each color channel (blue, green, and red) is allocated 5 bits per pixel (BPP).
member.returns: The pixel format

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.SyntaxEditor.UI.PixelFormats.Bgr565
member.summary: Gets the pixel format. is a sRGB format with 16 bits per pixel (BPP). Each color channel (blue, green, and red) is allocated 5, 6, and 5 bits per pixel (BPP) respectively.
member.returns: The pixel format.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.SyntaxEditor.UI.PixelFormats.Bgra32
member.summary: Gets the pixel format. is a sRGB format with 32 bits per pixel (BPP). Each channel (blue, green, red, and alpha) is allocated 8 bits per pixel (BPP).
member.returns: The pixel format.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.SyntaxEditor.UI.PixelFormats.BlackWhite
member.summary: Gets the black and white pixel format which displays one bit of data per pixel as either black or white.
member.returns: The pixel format Black-and-White.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.SyntaxEditor.UI.PixelFormats.Cmyk32
member.summary: Gets the pixel format which displays 32 bits per pixel (BPP) with each color channel (cyan, magenta, yellow, and black) allocated 8 bits per pixel (BPP).
member.returns: The CMYK32 pixel format.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.SyntaxEditor.UI.PixelFormats.Default
member.summary: Gets the pixel format that is best suited for the particular operation.
member.returns: The best suited for the particular operation.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.SyntaxEditor.UI.PixelFormats.Gray16
member.summary: Gets the pixel format which displays a 16 bits-per-pixel grayscale channel, allowing 65536 shades of gray. This format has a gamma of 1.0.
member.returns: The pixel format.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.SyntaxEditor.UI.PixelFormats.Gray2
member.summary: Gets the pixel format which displays a 2 bits-per-pixel grayscale channel, allowing 4 shades of gray.
member.returns: The pixel format.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.SyntaxEditor.UI.PixelFormats.Gray32Float
member.summary: Gets the pixel format. displays a 32 bits per pixel (BPP) grayscale channel, allowing over 4 billion shades of gray. This format has a gamma of 1.0.

member.returns: The pixel format.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.SyntaxEditor.UI.PixelFormats.Pbgra32
member.summary: Gets the pixel format. is a sRGB format with 32 bits per pixel (BPP). Each channel (blue, green, red, and alpha) is allocated 8 bits per pixel (BPP). Each color channel is pre-multiplied by the alpha value.
member.returns: The pixel format.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.SyntaxEditor.UI.PixelFormats.Prgba128Float
member.summary: Gets the pixel format. is a ScRGB format with 128 bits per pixel (BPP). Each channel (red, green, blue, and alpha) is allocated 32 bits per pixel (BPP). Each color channel is pre-multiplied by the alpha value. This format has a gamma of 1.0.
member.returns: The pixel format.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.SyntaxEditor.UI.PixelFormats.Prgba64
member.summary: Gets the pixel format. is a sRGB format with 64 bits per pixel (BPP). Each channel (blue, green, red, and alpha) is allocated 32 bits per pixel (BPP). Each color channel is pre-multiplied by the alpha value. This format has a gamma of 1.0.
member.returns: The pixel format.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.SyntaxEditor.UI.PixelFormats.Rgb128Float
member.summary: Gets the pixel format. is a ScRGB format with 128 bits per pixel (BPP). Each color channel is allocated 32 BPP. This format has a gamma of 1.0.
member.returns: The pixel format.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.SyntaxEditor.UI.PixelFormats.Rgb24
member.summary: Gets the pixel format. is a sRGB format with 24 bits per pixel (BPP). Each color channel (red, green, and blue) is allocated 8 bits per pixel (BPP).
member.returns: The pixel format.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.SyntaxEditor.UI.PixelFormats.Rgb48
member.summary: Gets the pixel format. is a sRGB format with 48 bits per pixel (BPP). Each color channel (red, green, and blue) is allocated 16 bits per pixel (BPP). This format has a gamma of 1.0.
member.returns: The pixel format.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.SyntaxEditor.UI.PixelFormats.Rgba128Float

member.name: T:Telerik.WinControls.TernaryRasterOperations
member.summary: Specifies a raster-operation code. These codes define how the color data for the source rectangle is to be combined with the color data for the destination rectangle to achieve the final color.

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.TernaryRasterOperations.SRCCOPY
member.summary: dest = source

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.TernaryRasterOperations.SRCPAINT
member.summary: dest = source OR dest

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.TernaryRasterOperations.SRCAND
member.summary: dest = source AND dest

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.TernaryRasterOperations.SRCINVERT
member.summary: dest = source XOR dest

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.TernaryRasterOperations.SRCERASE
member.summary: dest = source AND (NOT dest)

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.TernaryRasterOperations.NOTSRCCOPY
member.summary: dest = (NOT source)

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.TernaryRasterOperations.NOTSRCERASE
member.summary: dest = (NOT src) AND (NOT dest)

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.TernaryRasterOperations.MERGECOPY
member.summary: dest = (source AND pattern)

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.TernaryRasterOperations.MERGEPAINT
member.summary: dest = (NOT source) OR dest

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.TernaryRasterOperations.PATCOPY
member.summary: dest = pattern

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.TernaryRasterOperations.PATPAINT
member.summary: dest = DPSnoo

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.TernaryRasterOperations.PATINVERT
member.summary: dest = pattern XOR dest

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.TernaryRasterOperations.DSTINVERT
member.summary: dest = (NOT dest)

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.TernaryRasterOperations.BLACKNESS
member.summary: dest = BLACK

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.TernaryRasterOperations.WHITENESS
member.summary: dest = WHITE

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.TernaryRasterOperations.CAPTUREBLT
member.summary: Capture window as seen on screen. This includes layered windows such as WPF windows with AllowsTransparency="true"
